properties.name: Number Of Nodes
properties.desc: Displays the number of nodes in the field.

properties.name: Number Of Cell Sets
properties.desc: Displays the number of cell sets in the field.

properties.name: Total Number Of Cells
properties.desc: Displays the total number of cells in all cell sets of the field.

properties.name: Number Of Node Data
properties.desc: Displays the number of nodal data components in the field.

properties.name: Number Of Cell Data
properties.desc: Displays the number of cell data components in the field.

properties.name: Coordinate Units
properties.desc: Displays the coordinate units in the field.

properties.name: Coordinate Extents
properties.desc: Displays the coordinate extents of the field.
